Translations.Text: Ili ne seg DI kre heavens ter est able al kre sam creations? (Ke) Li predetermined them irrevocable life sxpin? disbelievers insist upon disbelieving
Proklam Se vi posed my Lord's trezor mercy vi withheld them tim vi exhaust them! human est est stingy
Ni supported Moses 9 profound mirakl - Pet Infan Israel! When li ir them Pharaoh dir al him mi opini vi Moses sorcx
Li dir Vi kon plen put ke ne 1 manifest these obviously Lord de heavens ter. Mi opini vi Pharaoh doomed
When li pursued them as li pel them land ni dron him together those flank him all da them
Ni dir al Infan Israel afterwards Ir viv this land. When final prophecy ven pas ni summon vi all 1 grup
Truthfully ni send gxi down truth gxi ven Ni ne send vi bearer bon news tro warner
Quran ni released slowly en ord vi leg gxi popol long period ni send gxi down all je once
Proklam Kred en gxi ne kred en gxi. Those posed knowledge previous scriptures when gxi recited them ili fal down their menton prostrating
Ili dir Glory est our Lord This fulfills our Lord's prophecy
Ili fal their menton prostrating plor,! Por gxi eg their reverence
Dir Vok Him DI vok Him plej Gracious; whichever nom vi uz Him aparten bon nom. Vi ne utter your Kontakt Prayers (Salat) tro loudly nor secretly; uz moder ton
Proklam Lauxd est al DI who neniam begotten fil nor does Li hav partner His kingship nor does Li bezon any ally weakness magnify Him constantly
Lauxd DI revealed His servant this scripture far gxi flawless
Perfekt (scripture) avert de severe retribution el Him liver bon news al believers plumb righteous life ke ili earned generous recompense
Wherein ili abide forever
Al avert those dir DI begotten fil
Ili ne posed knowledge this nor did their parents Ki blasphemy ven out da their busx! ki ili utter est gross mensog
Vi blame their response this narration their disbelieving en gxi; vi saddened
Ni ornam cxio ter en ord test them tiel disting those among them work righteousness
Inevitably ni visx out cxio gxi las gxi completely barren
Why aux vi pens ni est do telling vi popol kav numer connected kun them? Ili est our wondrous sign
When youths sorb rifugx kav ili dir Our Lord dusx us Your mercy ben our afer Your guidance
Ni tiam sigel their orel kav por predetermined numer jar
Tiam ni resurrected them seg which de 2 parti count duration their rest therein
Ni narrate vi their histori truthfully. Ili est youths kred en their Lord ni increased their guidance
Ni strengthened their kor when ili bud proklam Our nur Lord est Lord de heavens ter! Ni neniam worship any ali di Him. Otherwise ni est far astray
Here est our popol setting di Him! Nur ili proviz any proof support their bud! Who evil than unu fabricates mensog est atribu them DI
Ekde vi wish evit them their worshipping de ali than DI sorb rifugx kav! Maj your Lord dusx vi His mercy direct vi al des tuj decision
